module.name: FilterObjects
module.description: Filter the input objects based on different criterion

param.name: auto_process
param.description: If yes the module processes with a timer at fixed fps, if no the module processes based on the time stamp of the input stream

param.name: allow_unsync_input
param.description: If yes the module accepts that its input can be on a different time stamp. Only relevant if the module has many inputs. Use at your own risks.

param.name: class
param.description: Class of the module (define the module's function)

param.name: min_travel_dist
param.description: An object must have been tracked on this distance to be accepted [% of image diagonal]

param.name: min_border_dist
param.description: An object must be distant from the image border [% of image diagonal]

param.name: max_object_nb
param.description: If there are more than this number of objects, all are filtered out

param.name: min_obj_width
param.description: Minimum width to accept an object

param.name: min_obj_height
param.description: Minimum height to accept an object

param.name: max_obj_width
param.description: Maximum width to accept an object

param.name: max_obj_height
param.description: Maximum height to accept an object

param.name: custom_feature
param.description: Name of a custom feature to test. Must be of type float

param.name: min_custom
param.description: Min value for the custom feature

param.name: max_custom
param.description: Max value for the custom feature
